title: and that's why you didn't get honored
body:
"did that good
no honors
thanks team"
or something like that

...that's probably why you didn't get honored, bud.

replies.body: Impossible. You honor ***BEFORE*** you see that message. It has no effect
I think he's referring to entitled behavior.

This is an interesting thought. It hypothesizes the idea that self-centered personalities are apparent in observing how someone plays league. I think this is probably true, right? Hording kills, buffs, not helping out as much around the map, etc..
It's really not that deep bruh...

Doesn't matter how well you do, if you're a jerk to me in game I'm not honoring you.

EDIT: I've been down voted by those who believe honor belongs to those who carried the game no matter how shitty they are as people. Honor is about being a good teammate, otherwise there wouldn't be any for the losing team.

OP sounds really salty about this.  Did you get carried and had a chip about it?  Why is it bad that someone who did well, and didn't get honored, feel slighted?  And isn't that folly on them if it is a folly at all?  Focus on yourself OP.

> [{quoted}](name=Cojak,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zKQf9MPZ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-05-18T22:22:30.283+0000)
>
> OP sounds really salty about this.  Did you get carried and had a chip about it?  Why is it bad that someone who did well, and didn't get honored, feel slighted?  And isn't that folly on them if it is a folly at all?  Focus on yourself OP.

everyone on our team was doing rather well that game, and everyone contributed a good portion. he wasn't even the one doing the most damage (to champions) either, so I wouldn't really say that he was carrying.

In a situation like that, I'll sometimes say "no honors :("

Don't say "thanks team" or anything like that, because you don't just honor people for doing well in the game.  It's just still disappointing when you actually do really well and don't get any honors from your teammates.

This thread is a prime example of why honor system is silly. 

its about you, not about honoring others. {{sticker:katarina-love}}
